location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Pringle Riach, Acting Resident, Bushire to Captain Robert Taylor, Resident at Bussorah [Basra]

mods.abstract: The letter concerns the loss of Syed Hamzah's baglow [baghlah], on which Taylor had shipped a Government packet and a box containing ancient coins to an address in Bombay. Riach reports that the vessel had been plundered by the people of Bordagkhan and that there was no hope of recovering any of the property on board. The vessel had also been carrying a cargo of dates.
